title: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
summary_full: Far-left militants are suspected of being behind Quentin Deranque's death and the party of Jean-Luc Mélenchon is being widely condemned.
summary_public: Far-left militants are suspected of being behind Quentin Deranque's death and the party of Jean-Luc Mélenchon is being widely condemned.

FR.label: negative
FR.evidence: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble
